numericalGrade

public static char numericalGrade(double ave)
precondition: The average score cannot be negative and the average score cannot also be greater than 100

Parameters:
ave - is the average score
grade - is the letter grade earned by the student from the average score
Returns:
the letter grade (grade)
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the average score is negative
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the average score is greater than 100

satisfiesMajorRequirement

public static boolean satisfiesMajorRequirement(char grade)
Precondition: The assigned grade entered has to be a character.

Parameters:
satisfiesMajorRequirements - is a boolean that determines whether a student gets credit for a course (grade of 'C' or better) in the student's major.
grade - is the letter grade earned by the student i.e 'A','B','C','D' or 'F'
Returns:
the satisfiesMajorRequirement boolean as to whether a student gets credit for a course (grade of 'C' or better) in the student's major.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the grade entered to be evaluated is not a character 'A','B','C','D' or 'F'
